About

More About Me

Howdy!

My name is David Hernandez from Tampa, FL and just moved to Dallas to validate my skillset as a Web Developer by attending DevMountain's Web Development Bootcamp.

My previous career was in the automotive industry but I found myself yearning for a new challenge and opportunities, and I'm confident I'll find what I'm looking for in the software development field. Now, I can build with languages and frameworks such as HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Express, Authentication, and PostgreSQL, but I would also be very excited to work on a project that pushes me to learn new technologies.

I've Got Some skills.

  • CSS3
  • JavaScript
  • React
  • Redux
  • Material UI
  • Node.js

  • Testing

Barney's Motorcycle and Marine

Senior Parts Associate
  • Achieved 153% sales-quota by coupling robust product knowledge with strong customer relations.

  • In over one year, sold over $500,000 worth of parts, accessories, and apparel for imported sport bikes, cruisers, Jet Skis and WaveRunners, and ATVs . Set records for amount sold in one day and amount sold in one month.
